Nice to meet you

Hello, I'm Tyler

I'm a full stack developer building eye-pleasing applications for people on the internet to use from a wide range of technologies and software engineering principles.

Summary

Helping people grow

I'm currently working on many side projects and teaching people to code on YouTube where you can find me building practical stuff with the latest technologies.

Outside of my full-time commitments, I learn new technologies to through books, documentation and blogs to create amazing products and keep myself constantly update-to-date on everything software development.

I'm passionate about building applications that use a wide range of technologies like React, Redux, Node, JavaScript, TypeScript, PostgreSQL and NGINX to bring ideas to life and gain the knowledge with every new product deployed.

I also love talking with other developers, reading documentation, blogs and sharing it with the community to help others grow as a way for me to retain information.

Background story

Doing what I love

Programming has always been something I was into since high school. I learned to code on my own out of curiousity starting with Java to show friends what I was working on for a game called Minecraft which gave me the foundation to jump into other things.

This curiousity and drive helped me stay up-to-date to ensure I can use the most modern technologies and explain my reasoning. I believe in working hard and smart instead of searching for "hacks and shortcuts".

Nowadays, I've been fortunate enough to share and give back to the community by helping people solve their problems, writing articles, and sharing my knowledge on YouTube to educate and inspire others to get into this.

Why code?

Building things people can use

As more people get introduced to the internet and technology advance. I have a special opportunity to build anything no matter the complexity and have anyone use it.

Coding allows me to constantly learn and think of everything in a logical way. Everybody enjoys using their devices whether it's for work or play and this is why I love building well polished applications that makes me and the end users happy.

If you'd like to know more about me, my work or have any questions, feel free to send me an email anytime.

What can I do for you?

Get in touch

I'm always happy to talk about working together, new opportunities or just answer questions. Send me an email and I'll get back at you as soon as possible.

Responds within 2-3 hours
